title: Bad for You
description: The first time I saw Lila Cooper, I vowed to make her mine. She was dangerousâ€”those big brown eyes saw far more in me than a biker good with his fists. Far more than I wanted her to see.But I had to let her go. My screwed-up family destroys everything they touch, and my club sent me to clean up my brother's mess. I couldn't risk Lila getting hurt. So I hurt her instead, the woman who owned my heart.Now she's determined to forget me. But I'll do anything for a second chance, even reveal the scars on my soul...
author: Sherilee Gray
